snippet: Watch movies for free and save on parking and popcorn, Richard O'Dwyer told users of his site, according to American authorities who are using that information in its case for extradition of Mr. O'Dwyer.
abstract: Watch movies for free and save on parking and popcorn, Richard O'Dwyer told users of his site, according to American authorities who are using that information in its case for extradition of Mr. O'Dwyer.

headline.main: Extradition Suspect Calculated the Savings From Piracy
